attributes.action: Introduce a bill in parliament witch states "no goverment has the right to take away peoples liberty and freedom to wear Burkhas and Hijabs if they choose to do so".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the citizens of the United Kingdom wholey and without aquivacation Vote against a ban on Burkhas and Hijabs in order to defend and protect the freedom and rights of all women to choose what they wear and how they wear it.We the people do not believe it is for the goverment to dictate what we wear.all women can be identified by other women and vails can be removed for women in these cases.The arguments presented for a ban make the assumption that we need to give up our essential liberty to purchase temporary security. in the words of one of the founding fathers of America "Those who give up essential liberty for security deserve neither liberty nor security". we ask all our representatives who we elected and sent to parliament and 
Downing street, help protect our liberty and freedom now as should you fail us in our hour of need we shall allow our actions at the ballet box to show you how we get rid of a useless government and replace it with one witch acts in the best interest of all its people and who's first priority is freedom liberty and true justice for all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
